sourcesContent: import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import {Col,Row,Container,ListGroup, Button} from 'react-bootstrap' import axios from 'axios' function ProductsScreen({match}) { return ( <> {data.name} =0.5?"fas fa-star":data.rating>0?"fas fa-star-half-alt":"far fa-star"}`}> =1.5?"fas fa-star":data.rating>1?"fas fa-star-half-alt":"far fa-star"}`}> =2.5?"fas fa-star":data.rating>2?"fas fa-star-half-alt":"far fa-star"}`}> =3.5?"fas fa-star":data.rating>3?"fas fa-star-half-alt":"far fa-star"}`}> =4.5?"fas fa-star":data.rating>4?"fas fa-star-half-alt":"far fa-star"}`}> {` `}{data.numReviews} reviews Price : {data.price} $ description : {data.description} Price {data.price} $ Status {data.countInStock>0?"In Stock":"Disabled"} 0?false:true} style={{textAlign:'center'}}> ) } export default ProductsScreen
